h1.base: margin: 32px 0 0; font-size: 2em; letter-spacing: -0.03em; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center;
h1.content: font-weight: bold; color: #ef7060; display: inline-block; border-bottom: 1px solid #ef7060;

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 0; font-size: 1.5em; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.5; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(239,112,96,0.2);
h2.content: font-weight: bold; color: #ffffff; background: #ef7060; padding: 1px 4px; border-radius: 3px;

list.taskList: list-style: none; margin-left: -24px; font-size: 1em; color: #4a4a4a; line-height: 1.8;

code.block: background: #fff8f7; padding: 0.5em 1em 1em; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre; overflow-x: auto; word-wrap: normal; color: #333; margin: 1.2em 0; border: 1px solid #ffe8e6; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(239,112,96,0.05); width: 100%;
code.inline: background: #fff8f7; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #333; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; border: 1px solid #ffe8e6;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #ef7060; border-radius: 6px; padding: 16px 20px; background: #fff8f7; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #d64b3b; font-style: italic; font-size: 1em; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block;
styles.link: color: #ef7060; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #ef7060; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #ffe8e6;
table.header: background: #fff8f7; font-weight: bold; color: #4a4a4a; border-bottom: 2px solid #ffe8e6; font-size: 1em;
